name: The Sinking of the Dream Chaser
name_original: The Sinking of the Dream Chaser
description:
Welcome to the post-apocalyptic world of "The Sinking of the Dream Chaser"! This 2D point-and-click adventure game takes you on a journey alongside Led, a servant robot with a mysterious past and a dire need for answers.

As the game begins, you find Led awakening in the stern of the ship named Dream Chaser. However, something is terribly wrong. Led discovers that he is broken and malfunctioning, and his memory drives have been corrupted. Lost and confused he needs to unravel the enigma that surrounds him.

In "The Sinking of the Dream Chaser", you will embark on a quest to uncover the truth behind Led's existence, the fate of the ship, and the whereabouts of his master.

The game features:

  • Engaging Point-and-Click Gameplay: Experience the classic point-and-click mechanics as you interact with the environment, solve puzzles, and progress through the story.
  • Enigmatic Storyline: Dive deep into an intriguing and mysterious narrative to uncover the truth.
  • Stunning 2D Visuals: Immerse yourself in a beautifully hand-drawn world, filled with intricate details and atmospheric settings.
  • Rich and Dynamic Soundtrack: Enjoy an original musical score that enhances the immersive atmosphere of the game.

Join Led on his extraordinary adventure and become part of a compelling tale filled with twists, revelations, and a captivating world waiting to be explored. Will you be able to piece together the fragments of Led's past and unveil the secrets hidden within the ship? The answers lie in your hands.
